mapper.insert: insert into review(review_title, review_contents, review_rating, review_writer, review_date, review_movieid, review_sympathy, review_notsympathy) values(#{REVIEW_TITLE}, #{REVIEW_CONTENTS}, #{REVIEW_RATING}, #{REVIEW_WRITER}, #{REVIEW_DATE}, ${REVIEW_MOVIEID}, #{REVIEW_SYMPATHY}, #{REVIEW_NOTSYMPATHY})
mapper.select: select * from REVIEW where REVIEW_MOVIEID=#{value} order by REVIEW_SYMPATHY DESC
select * from REVIEW where REVIEW_MOVIEID=#{value} order by REVIEW_DATE DESC
select * from REVIEW where REVIEW_MOVIEID=#{value} order by REVIEW_RATING DESC
